product_title: Chloe Roll Cuff Denim Bermuda Shorts
product_description: Take it easy and breezy in these pull-on shorts cut from dark-rinsed denim with a comfy wide waistband.
product_details_and_care:
Take it easy and breezy in these pull-on shorts cut from dark-rinsed denim with a comfy wide waistband.
9" inseam; 22" leg opening; 11 1/2" front rise; 18 1/2" back rise (size 18W)
Pull-on style with elastic waist
Five-pocket style
57% cotton, 21% viscose, 14% modal, 6% polyester, 2% elastane
Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported
Item #6039068
